originalText.text: Studio Kestrel is always such a pleasure to work with.  I’ve worked with Paul on several big projects in Manhattan and Brooklyn and not only were the finished apartments gorgeous, but the design process was seamless and installations were always on schedule.  The apartments are warm and inviting, but also luxurious and unique. Right now we’re in the middle of another big project in Chelsea and I can’t wait to see the beautiful design presentation that Paul recently shared with us come to life in the space.

originalText.text:
Paul De Andrade of Studio Kestrel is a hidden gem in the world of interior design. I started working with Paul in 2015 on a luxury New Development project in New York City and from our first meeting, I knew immediately that I had to work with him because of his creative vision and because of his calm and confident demeanor. This was my first project in New Development, and I needed to impress my client with a standout design for our trophy residence. I was not the only one impressed as this $60M Penthouse apartment sold just one month after he brought the space to life.

After this project, Paul and I worked together on four other buildings and each time, he continues to impress me with his taste but also his intuition. Time and time again, Paul brings a client's vision to life - even when the client isn't totally sure what their style is yet. He makes the design process fun, exciting and so seamless, which is rare in a world of logistics, furniture delays, and COIs. One of my favorite things about witnessing Paul’s work is his ability to create a space that is inviting and comfortable but also sleek and stylish. No two homes that Paul creates are alike - he is incredibly versatile, creative, and passionate about interior design.

After working with Paul for seven years, I asked if he could design my personal apartment, and I could not be more thrilled with the finished result! I was moving in with my significant other and Paul, being the seasoned designer that he is, knew that an initial, in-person meeting with all three of us would be key in combining our lives. Paul walked both of our apartments to get a sense of what we liked and to see what pieces we could incorporate into our new home. He helped us establish our personal style and as a bonus – there were no fights between my partner and me! Working with Paul made our move enjoyable instead of stressful and we could not be happier in our cozy sanctuary.

originalText.text: Paul and his team are incredible. They delivered a stunning vision. The staged units were able to yield a strong return on the investment and in turn record breaking prices on a new development in the financial district/ downtown Manhattan. They are very easy to work with! I would highly recommend.

originalText.text: Great experience. Paul has such a good eye. He did an amazing job. Thank you again for your beautiful work.
